title: Arista Networks | Engineer | Pune
content:
Education: M.Tech and B.Tech in EEE
Years of Experience: 4 years 10 months
Prior Experience: Senior Software Engineer at Qualcomm India
Date of the Offer: 15 March,.
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Pune, India
Salary: 30 Lakhs
Relocation: 2 Lakhs
Signing Bonus: 3 Lakhs (Anniversary)
Stock bonus: $45K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 70 Lakhs
Benefits: 18 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + 11 National holidays

title: Microsoft | SSE (L63) | Noida | Negotiating
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 9 years
Prior Experience: SSE at Indian product based startup
Current CTC: 55L + 10L (Base + ESOPs)
Date of the Offer: May 24
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SSE - L63
Location: Bangalore
Fixed Salary: 50L
Signing Bonus: 8L + 2L
RSU: $100K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base, considering 15% ~ 7.5L
Total comp for 1st year: ~ 50 + 8 + 7.5 + 20 = 85.5L
Total comp for 2nd year: ~ 50 + 2 + 7.5 + 20 = 79.5L
Benefits: Standard MS benifits

Feeling quite dissapointed with such a low-ball offer. Trying to negotiate, not sure if they will increase.
Also I am currently based out of Bengaluru, how is noida like? Is it worth relocating to Noida given the current housing + traffic situation at Bengaluru. People who have lived in Noida how is the quality of life and safety compared to Bengaluru?

title: Blinkit | SDE-1 | Gurgaon | Accepted
content:
College : Tier 3
Education : B.Tech in CSE (2023 Grad)
Years of Experience: 4 months as full-time at a Fintech Startup
Prior Experience: 1 year of Internship Experience

Date of the Offer : April 2024
Company : Blinkit
Title/Level : SDE - 1 
Location : Gurgaon
Base : 24 Lakh 
Performance Bonus : 5 Lakh
**Total comp (Base + Bonus) : 29 LPA**

P.S. : Got to know about the opening over linkedin, reached out for referrals and finally got the Interview call.
yoe: 4 Months As Full-time At A Fintech Startup

title: Flexport | SDE-2  | Bengaluru | Accepted
content:
College: Tier 3
Education: BTech( CSE )
Years of Experience: ~4
Company: Flexport
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Remote(Banglore, India)
Prev Comp: 33L+Bonus(11 lakhs RSU)
Base Salary: 58,00,000
Relocation: 
Signing Bonus: 5 LPA
RSU: 14800 (148000$ Pre IPO stock right now paper money)
Vesting Period: 4 years 
Bonus: 10% every year
Total comp 1st year (Base + Bonus + Stock): 68.8L
Benefits: Insurance, leaves ,flexibile working (one day office a week)

I have heared they are doing good and their founder is back as CEO. India team have ownership of good products .

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5170498/Flexport-or-SDE-2-or-Offer

title: Quince vs Games24x7 | SDE-2 | Bangalore
content:

Years of Experience: 2 years 
Current Organization? B2B Unicorn Startup

Company:Quince
Title/Level: SDE 2 
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 30 LPA 
Stock bonus: 300 Units over 5 years worth 35.5 lakhs (Going to ipo in 2026)
Bonus: 2 Lakhs

Company: Games 24x7
Title/Level: SDE 2 
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 33 LPA 
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 3.96 Lakhs 
Benefits:Free Food + 5 lakhs Health Insurance Cover 

Also how much is SDE 2 Band for games 24*7

Which among the two offers is better , im quite confused
